thread.title: Plus-size transgender model Shay Neary talks body love | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Plus-size transgender model Shay Neary talks body love | Daily Mail Online

author: Clemence Michallon For Dailymail.Com
title: Plus-size transgender model Shay Neary talks body love | Daily Mail Online
text: 'I stopped caring what anyone else thought': Plus-size transgender model explains how she learned to love 'every curve, shape and dip' of her body in an empowering video Shay Neary, 28, said she focuses on looking good for herself, not to please others 'I constantly look in the mirror and tell myself I love myself,' she said in a clip Became the first plus-size transgender model to land a major campaign last year Began her modeling career unsure that she would be signed due to her size But was signed in just a week and now preaches self-acceptance online Published: 18:31 GMT, 16 February 2017 | Updated: 18:58 GMT, 16 February 2017 484 shares
